p: For the chromatographic peak 9 (4.36 min), a precursor ion [M − H] − at m/ z 367.1035 with a predicted molecular formula C 17H 19O 9 (mass error 0.5 ppm) was detected, suggesting the presence of feruloylquinic acid (FQA). The MS2 base peak at m/ z 191.0550, associated with quinic acid and a product ion at m/ z 173.0444, was often found for the 5-FQA [ 23] ( Figure S2o).
